code: import{legacy_createStore,applyMiddleware,compose}from"redux";import createSagaMiddleware from"redux-saga";import rootSaga from"../saga/rootsaga";import rootReducer from"../reducer/index";var sagaMiddleware=createSagaMiddleware();var composeEnhancers=window.__REDUX_DEVTOOLS_EXTENSION_COMPOSE__||compose;var store=legacy_createStore(rootReducer,composeEnhancers(applyMiddleware(sagaMiddleware)));sagaMiddleware.run(rootSaga);export default store;
